trigger.match: ^(?:White teeth shining brightly\, you flash a compellingly charismatic smile to all around you|You feel the presence of [A-Z][a-z]+ next to you|The blood of [A-Z][a-z]+ surges through .+?\, washing you with its healing powers|Frothy water swirls at your feet and glowing foam travels up your body)\.$
trigger.name: cure_generally__

trigger.match: ^The healing presence of (?:[A-Z][a-z]+\'s|your) spirit totem washes over you\.$
trigger.name: cure_totem__

trigger.match: ^You are also caught in the ray of light\.$
trigger.name: cure_moon_full__

trigger.match: ^Swinging about in a wild dance\, you call down upon the powers of the moon to heal you of afflictions\. A soft beam of moonlight suffuses you, curing you of sickness\.$
trigger.name: cure_moon_full2__
trigger.send: if flags.get("power_cure_try") == "moondance full" then prompt.illqueue(function () defs.add("prismatic") end) flags.set("last_cure", "moon full") flags.clear("power_cure_try") end main.allcure(true)

trigger.match: ^Pressing your hands together before you\, you concentrate on your heart chakra\. An emerald glow suffuses your chest and you feel your afflictions drain away\.$
trigger.name: cure_invoke_green__
trigger.send: if flags.get("power_cure_try") == "invoke green" then flags.set("last_cure", "invoke green") flags.clear("power_cure_try") end main.allcure(true)

trigger.match: ^Muttering the secret names of Gedulah\, you trace a glowing circle above you\. The circle passes through your body and you feel your afflictions drain away\.$
trigger.name: cure_evoke_gedulah__
trigger.send: if flags.get("power_cure_try") == "evoke gedulah" then flags.set("last_cure", "evoke gedulah") flags.clear("power_cure_try") end main.allcure(true)

trigger.match: ^You bathe in the glory of the holy light that surrounds you\.$
trigger.name: cure_holylight__

trigger.match: ^The presence of your Deity\'s avatar soothes you\.$
trigger.name: cure_exalt_aura__

trigger.match: ^The divine aura of curing around you hums briefly as it draws an affliction from your body\.$
trigger.name: cure_shrine__

trigger.match: ^(?:A warm zephyr caresses your skin and clears your mind|You pass through a pink cloud and feel refreshed|A westerly breeze brings in a clean\,? sweet scent that invigorates your body)\.$
trigger.name: cure_westwind__

trigger.match: ^With an heroic effort\,? you manage to writhe yourself free from the (cross|antlers|(?:only |second )?blade through your (?:left|right) foot|blade through your gut)\.$
trigger.name: cure_impaleheroic__

trigger.match: ^With a snarl of contempt\, [A-Z][a-z]+ allows you to slide free of [hH](?:is|er) antlers\.$
trigger.name: cure_antlers_withdraw__

trigger.match: ^With a snarl of contempt\, [A-Z][a-z]+ withdraws [hH](?:is|er) weapon from your (gut|left leg|right leg)\.$
trigger.name: cure_impaled_withdraw__

trigger.match: ^A pale glow surrounds you as the moonwater soothes you\.$
trigger.name: cure_moonwater__

trigger.match: ^Energy wreathes itself about your body to heal your limbs\.$
trigger.name: cure_restoration__

trigger.match: ^You return to the normal timestream\.$
trigger.name: cure_aeon__

trigger.match: ^You sneeze suddenly and\, with great relief\, feel that your allergies have cleared up completely\.$
trigger.name: cure_allergies__

trigger.match: ^You suddenly sneeze\,? then feel your allergies settle down slightly\.$
trigger.name: cure_allergies_level__

trigger.match: ^You sense the choking effect of the shadow leaving you\.$
trigger.name: cure_choke__

trigger.match: ^The dark fate shrouding your mind has passed\.$
trigger.name: cure_darkfate__

trigger.match: ^You sigh in relief as the ravaging plague subsides\.$
trigger.name: cure_homeostasis__

trigger.match: ^You have fully recovered your breath\.$
trigger.name: cure_hyperventilating__

trigger.match: ^You carefully writhe out of ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s grapple\, escaping [hH](?:is|er) grasp\.$
trigger.name: cure_grapple_person__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) loses control of [hH](?:is|er) grapple on you\.$
trigger.name: cure_grapple_lost__

trigger.match: ^You have writhed free of your (ropes|tight bindings|state of transfixion|entanglement|thorny vines|shackles)(\, slicing flesh into bloody ribbons)?\.$
trigger.name: cure_writhed__

trigger.match: ^You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe__

trigger.match: ^There is no beast clamped onto you\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_clamp__

trigger.match: ^You aren\'t entangled\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_entangle__

trigger.match: ^You aren\'t grappled\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_grapple__

trigger.match: ^You aren\'t hoisted\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_hoist__

trigger.match: ^You aren\'t bound in ropes\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_ropes__

trigger.match: ^You aren\'t shackled\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_shackles__

trigger.match: ^You aren\'t transfixed\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_transfix__

trigger.match: ^You aren\'t trussed up\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_truss__

trigger.match: ^There are no vines around you\! You begin to writhe helplessly\, throwing your body off balance\.$
trigger.name: cure_clear_writhe_vines__

trigger.match: ^Your (scalp|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) is sliced to shreds as the thorny vines are ripped away\.$
trigger.name: cure_writhed_thorns__

trigger.match: ^(?:Turning your head to the south\, you beseech the Spirits of Summer to set you free\. A sparkling wind comes forth from the south|Muttering the secret names of Tipheret\, you clench your fists\,? which begin to glow\. The glow spreads across your body)
trigger.name: cure_fastwrithe__

trigger.match: ^The vile black gunk that covers your body dissolves\.$
trigger.name: cure_gunk_cleanse__

trigger.match: ^The raging fire about your skin goes out\.$
trigger.name: cure_ablaze_cleanse__

trigger.match: ^The majesty of Mother Moon fades from your mind\.$
trigger.name: cure_succumbing__

trigger.match: ^Your muscles unlock\; you are no longer paralysed\.$
trigger.name: cure_paralysis__

trigger.match: ^You feel the muscles in your legs unlocking\.$
trigger.name: cure_leg_locked__

trigger.match: ^You feel the muscles in your throat opening up again\.$
trigger.name: cure_throat_locked__

trigger.match: ^You shrug off your impatience and focus your mind once again\.$
trigger.name: cure_impatience_focus__

trigger.match: ^Dexterity returns to your (left|right) arm as your cracked elbow heals\.$
trigger.name: cure_arms_elbow___

trigger.match: ^Your nervous system calms down as the collapsed nerve in your (left|right) arm mends\.$
trigger.name: cure_arms_nerve___

trigger.match: ^The pain in your chest clears as your heart resumes its normal rhythm\.$
trigger.name: cure_chest_chest_pain__

trigger.match: ^Your chest expands as your entire ribcage heals and cracks into place\.$
trigger.name: cure_chest_crushed_chest__

trigger.match: ^The pain in your gut subsides as health returns to your internal organs\.$
trigger.name: cure_gut_burst_organs__

trigger.match: ^The pain in your gut subsides as your innards regenerate\.$
trigger.name: cure_gut_disemboweled__

trigger.match: ^The pains in your stomach subside\.$
trigger.name: cure_gut_ruptured_gut__

trigger.match: ^Miraculously\, your spinal system regenerates\, restoring feeling to the rest of your body\.$
trigger.name: cure_gut_severed_spine__

trigger.match: ^The bones in your (left|right) ankle mend\.$
trigger.name: cure_legs_ankle___

trigger.match: ^Dexterity returns to your legs as your cracked (left|right) kneecap heals\.$
trigger.name: cure_legs_kneecap___

trigger.match: ^The tendon in your (left|right) leg reattaches itself\.$
trigger.name: cure_legs_tendon___

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) (arm|leg) is greatly healed\, but still damaged\.$
trigger.name: cure_mangledlimb_broken__

trigger.match: ^Your ability to breathe greatly improves as your collapsed lung fills with air once again\.$
trigger.name: cure_collapsedlungs__

trigger.match: ^Your head is greatly healed\, but still damaged\.$
trigger.name: cure_concussion1__

trigger.match: ^As your concussion lifts\, your thinking becomes clearer\.$
trigger.name: cure_concussion2__

trigger.match: ^Your head feels stronger and healthier\.$
trigger.name: cure_damaged_head__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) eye socket itches as a new eyeball suddenly fills the empty cavity\.$
trigger.name: cure_losteye__

trigger.match: ^Your jaw partially realigns into place as the bones there partially heal\.$
trigger.name: cure_shattered_jaw__

trigger.match: ^A new (left|right) (arm|leg) grows where the old one was\, though one that is quite sickly and in poor repair\.$
trigger.name: cure_severedlimb_mangled__

trigger.match: ^The thorny vines on your (head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) wither away\.$
trigger.name: cure_thorns_limb__

trigger.match: ^You feel one of your burst blood vessels knit back together\.$
trigger.name: cure_burst_vessel__

trigger.match: ^You feel the last of your burst blood vessels knit back together\.$
trigger.name: cure_burst_vessels__

trigger.match: ^You feel your health\, mana and ego replenished\.$
trigger.name: sparkleberry_healing__

trigger.match: ^The dazzling afterimage fades from your vision\.$
trigger.name: cure_afterimage__

trigger.match: ^Your bout of bad luck has ended\.$
trigger.name: cure_bad_luck__

trigger.match: ^You do not bleed\, my friend\.$
trigger.name: cure_bleeding_all__

trigger.match: ^The ache in your ear canals clears up\.$
trigger.name: cure_earache__

trigger.match: ^You no longer feel lightheaded and weak\.$
trigger.name: cure_lightheaded__

trigger.match: ^The sense of impending doom lifts\.$
trigger.name: cure_omen__

trigger.match: ^You are capable of offensive acts once more\.$
trigger.name: cure_pacifism__

trigger.match: ^The phantom shadows that plague your mind are lifted\.$
trigger.name: cure_phantoms__

trigger.match: ^Your fingers and toes begin to tingle\, and before long the grey fades from your skin and flushes a healthy colour\. You are no longer a statue\!$
trigger.name: cure_statue__

trigger.match: ^The ugly\, cankerous sores on your skin clear up and close\.$
trigger.name: cure_taint_sick__

trigger.match: ^Your mind is no longer being drained by [A-Z][a-z]+\.$
trigger.name: cure_vampirism__

trigger.match: ^You are no longer stunned( and have a brief stun immunity)?\.$
trigger.name: cure_stunned__
trigger.send: if affs.has("stunned") and #"%1" > 0 then flags.set("stun_immunity", true, 2) end affs.del_queue("stunned")

trigger.match: ^You are no longer immune from stun\.$
trigger.name: stun_unimmune__

trigger.match: ^You feel the curse of the (Bat|Herb|Snake) Bane lift(?:s|ed) from your being\.$
trigger.name: cure_bane__

trigger.match: ^(?:You open your eyes and (?:yawn mightily|stretch languidly\, feeling deliciously well\-rested)|You already are awake|You are jerked awake by the (?:pain|need to vomit))\.$
trigger.name: cure_asleep__

trigger.match: ^The (.+?) aura surrounding you dissipates\.$
trigger.name: cure_healing_aura__
trigger.send: if "%1" == "deadly bedeviling" then affs.del_queue("bedeviled") flags.clear("bedeviler") failsafe.disable("bedevil") elseif "%1" == "deadly aurawarp" then affs.del_queue{"aurawarp", "homeostasis"} flags.clear("aurawarper") failsafe.disable("aurawarp") end

trigger.match: ^(?:The raging fire about your skin goes out|Steam rises from your skin as the fires that plague you are extinguished|You sigh in relief as the fire on your body flickers and fades|With a loud hiss of steam\, you sigh in relief as the waters put out the flames on your body|The biting cold of the water washes over you and extinguishes the flames on you)\.$
trigger.name: cure_ablaze__

trigger.match: ^The screeching fades away from your inner hearing\.$
trigger.name: cure_achromatic__

trigger.match: ^Your terrible addiction to lovely elixirs seems to wane\.$
trigger.name: cure_addiction__

trigger.match: ^You can handle the idea of open spaces again\.$
trigger.name: cure_agoraphobia__

trigger.match: ^The angelic host focused on you vanish(?:es)? in a blaze of empyreal light\.$
trigger.name: cure_angelic_host__

trigger.match: ^Food is no longer repulsive to you\.$
trigger.name: cure_anorexia__

trigger.match: ^The flow of blood recedes as your forehead cuts mend\.$
trigger.name: cure_artery_head__

trigger.match: ^The flow of blood recedes as your (left|right) (arm|leg)\'s main artery mends\.$
trigger.name: cure_artery_limb__

trigger.match: ^Your bronchial tubes open up and your asthma is cured\.$
trigger.name: cure_asthma__

trigger.match: ^Your strength surges as your (left|right) bicep mends\.$
trigger.name: cure_bicep__

trigger.match: ^The Binah Sphere no longer surrounds you\.$
trigger.name: cure_binah_sphere__

trigger.match: ^You breathe easier as your lungs clear up of the dreadful black phlegm\.$
trigger.name: cure_black_lung__

trigger.match: ^Your bleeding slows as your blood clots\.$
trigger.name: cure_bleeding__

trigger.match: ^Blessed sight returns to you\.$
trigger.name: cure_blindness__

trigger.match: ^The pain in your (left|right) (hip|shoulder) recedes as the blood clot there dissolves\.$
trigger.name: cure_blood_clot__

trigger.match: ^You can breathe easier as your ribs snap into place\.$
trigger.name: cure_broken_chest__

trigger.match: ^Your jaw clicks into place as the bones there heal\.$
trigger.name: cure_broken_jaw__

trigger.match: ^The bones in your (left|right) (arm|leg) mend\.$
trigger.name: cure_broken_limb__

trigger.match: ^The salve fizzles away without effect\.$
trigger.name: cure_broken_limb_fizzle__

trigger.match: ^With a loud crack\, your broken nose straightens and heals\.$
trigger.name: cure_broken_nose__

trigger.match: ^The broken bones of your (left|right) wrist click into place and become whole\.$
trigger.name: cure_broken_wrist__

trigger.match: ^Your burnt flesh is soothed\.$
trigger.name: cure_burns__

trigger.match: ^(?:You heal some of your burns\,? but you still have (first|second|third|fourth) degree burns|You completely heal your burn damage)\.$
trigger.name: cure_burned__

trigger.match: ^You have writhed free of the jaws of the mutt clamped on your (left|right) arm\.$
trigger.name: cure_clamped__

trigger.match: ^Small spaces no longer frighten you\.$
trigger.name: cure_claustrophobia__

trigger.match: ^Thank Estarra\! Your clumsiness has been cured\.$
trigger.name: cure_clumsiness__

trigger.match: ^A coil of cloud choking you disperses\.$
trigger.name: cure_coils__

trigger.match: ^The confusion lifts from your mind and it is clear once again\.$
trigger.name: cure_confusion__

trigger.match: ^The potion burns through your veins\, destroying the deadly poisons that are killing you\.$
trigger.name: cure_crotamine__

trigger.match: ^The cartilage and nerves in your windpipe heal and your voice returns\.$
trigger.name: cure_crushed_windpipe__

trigger.match: ^The curse of the dark moon passes from your spirit\.$
trigger.name: cure_darkmoon__

trigger.match: ^You mind quickly focuses on the real world\, shrugging off childish daydreams\.$
trigger.name: cure_daydreams__

trigger.match: ^You are no longer deadened\.$
trigger.name: cure_deadening__

trigger.match: ^The sounds of the world gradually return to you\.$
trigger.name: cure_deafness__

trigger.match: ^You feel the dark mark upon your body finally disappear\.$
trigger.name: cure_deathmark__

trigger.match: ^You laugh off the circuitous logic in your arguments\.$
trigger.name: cure_debate_circuitous__

trigger.match: ^The patience of a saint surrounds you\, and you refuse to hurry\.$
trigger.name: cure_debate_hurry__

trigger.match: ^Your mind suddenly cuts through the loopholes in the discussion\.$
trigger.name: cure_debate_loophole__

trigger.match: ^The deep damage in your (head|chest|gut|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) (completely|partially) heals\.$
trigger.name: cure_deepwounds__

trigger.match: ^Sanity returns to you and you are no longer demented\.$
trigger.name: cure_dementia__

trigger.match: ^Pain flares in your (left|right) (shoulder|hip) as your joints re\-seat themselves\.$
trigger.name: cure_dislocated_limb__

trigger.match: ^You step back into the normal timestream\.$
trigger.name: cure_displacement__

trigger.match: ^You begin intense concentration to restore your equilibrium\.$
trigger.name: cure_disrupted__

trigger.match: ^You are no longer dizzy\.$
trigger.name: cure_dizziness__

trigger.match: ^Your haunts from the dreaming fade away\.$
trigger.name: cure_dreamer__

trigger.match: ^Your bowels calm themselves\.$
trigger.name: cure_dysentery__

trigger.match: ^Despite your past failures in discourse\, your self\-confidence returns once again\.$
trigger.name: cure_ego_shattered__

trigger.match: ^The oppressive whispering in your mind dies out\.$
trigger.name: cure_ego_vice__

trigger.match: ^Strength returns as your shriveled muscles plump up\.$
trigger.name: cure_enfeebled__

trigger.match: ^Your nerves suddenly calm down\.$
trigger.name: cure_epilepsy__

trigger.match: ^There is nothing to fear but fear itself\.$
trigger.name: cure_fear_compose__

trigger.match: ^Your fear has been cured\.$
trigger.name: cure_fear__

trigger.match: ^A feeling of comfortable warmth spreads over you\.$
trigger.name: cure_fire__

trigger.match: ^Your step becomes more confident as the bones in your (left|right) foot mend\.$
trigger.name: cure_foot__

trigger.match: ^Your double vision subsides as the breaks in your skull fuse together\.$
trigger.name: cure_fractured_head__

trigger.match: ^The fracture in the bones of your (left|right) (arm) knit together\.$
trigger.name: cure_fractured_limb__

trigger.match: ^A chill runs over your icy skin\.$
trigger.name: cure_frost__

trigger.match: ^Though still shivering\, you are no longer frozen solid\.$
trigger.name: cure_frozen__

trigger.match: ^The bleeding in your brow subsides\.$
trigger.name: cure_furrowed_brow__

trigger.match: ^A jolting surge rumbles through your insides\.$
trigger.name: cure_galvanism__

trigger.match: ^The twitching in your face settles down\.$
trigger.name: cure_gashed_cheek__

trigger.match: ^Your gluttonous desires subside\.$
trigger.name: cure_gluttony__

trigger.match: ^Your hallucinations cease to plague you\.$
trigger.name: cure_hallucinations__

trigger.match: ^Your aching\, pain\-wracked body is soothed and calmed\.$
trigger.name: cure_healthleech__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) side tingles as feeling returns\.$
trigger.name: cure_hemiplegy__

trigger.match: ^Your lower body tingles as feeling returns\.$
trigger.name: cure_hemiplegy_legs__

trigger.match: ^Your blood regains its ability to clot\.$
trigger.name: cure_hemophilia__

trigger.match: ^[A-Z][a-z]+ suddenly releases (?:[hH]is|[hH]er) vice\-like grip on you\.$
trigger.name: cure_hoisted__

trigger.match: ^You feel a bit more alert and awake\.$
trigger.name: cure_hypersomnia__

trigger.match: ^The hypnotic lights that dance around you in beguiling patterns suddenly dissipate\.$
trigger.name: cure_hypnotic_patterns__

trigger.match: ^My\, you feel healthier than you have in years\.$
trigger.name: cure_hypochondria__

trigger.match: ^You notice the glow illuminating you fades away\.$
trigger.name: cure_illuminated__

trigger.match: ^You are patient once again\.$
trigger.name: cure_impatience__

trigger.match: ^You no longer have any temporary insanity\.$
trigger.name: cure_insanity__

trigger.match: ^Your sanity partially returns\, but you still suffer from a (slight|moderate|major|massive) case of temporary insanity\.$
trigger.name: cure_insanity_partial__

trigger.match: ^You sigh in relief as the jinx that confounds your mind lifts\.$
trigger.name: cure_jinx__

trigger.match: ^The curse of justice leaves you\.$
trigger.name: cure_justice__

trigger.match: ^The flow of blood recedes as your (left|right) (arm|leg)\'s laceration mends\.$
trigger.name: cure_lacerated_limb__

trigger.match: ^The lethargy evaporates\, leaving you full of energy\.$
trigger.name: cure_lethargy__

trigger.match: ^The awful loneliness leaves you\.$
trigger.name: cure_loneliness__

trigger.match: ^Your hearing sharpens as your (left|right) ear regenerates\.$
trigger.name: cure_lostear__

trigger.match: ^Mmmm\! You are seized with a sudden desire to find a mate\!$
trigger.name: cure_love__

trigger.match: ^What were you thinking\? You have no desire to find a mate\.$
trigger.name: cure_love_no__

trigger.match: ^You shake your head\, wondering what you ever saw in
trigger.name: cure_lovers__

trigger.match: ^An ominous noise lifts from within your mind\.$
trigger.name: cure_manabarbs__

trigger.match: ^You no longer enjoy pain\.$
trigger.name: cure_masochism__

trigger.match: ^You shrug off your narcoleptic tendencies\.$
trigger.name: cure_narcolepsy__

trigger.match: ^A warmth flows through your (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg)\.$
trigger.name: cure_numb__

trigger.match: ^Your amplified fears start to settle down\.$
trigger.name: cure_omniphobia__

trigger.match: ^The curse of Papaxi upon your (ego|health|mana)(?: reserves)? lifts\.$
trigger.name: cure_papaxi__

trigger.match: ^Aaaahhh\. No one is out to get you after all\.$
trigger.name: cure_paranoia__

trigger.match: ^The unnatural feeling of peace leaves you\.$
trigger.name: cure_peace__

trigger.name: cure_phantomsphere__

trigger.name: cure_phrenic_nerve__

trigger.name: cure_punctured_chest__

trigger.match: ^You breathe easier as your punctured lung mends\.$

trigger.match: ^Prudence rules your psyche once again\.$

trigger.name: cure_relapsing__

trigger.match: ^You no longer will inspire disloyalty among friends\.$
trigger.name: cure_repugnance__

trigger.match: ^Your muscles relax as the rigormortis subsides\.$
trigger.name: cure_rigormortis__

trigger.match: ^Oh\, thank the gods\! The infernal itching has subsided at long last\.$
trigger.name: cure_scabies__

trigger.match: ^Your scalp grows back but your forehead still has some remaining wounds\.$
trigger.name: cure_scalped__

trigger.name: cure_scarab__

trigger.name: cure_scrambled__

trigger.match: ^The stinging feeling fades\.$
trigger.name: cure_sensitivity__

trigger.name: cure_shivering__

trigger.name: cure_short_breath__

trigger.match: ^Your shyness has been cured\. You can now face the world boldly\.$

trigger.match: ^The flow of blood recedes as your gut mends\.$
trigger.name: cure_sliced_gut__

trigger.match: ^You feel your mouth return to normalcy as your tongue heals\.$
trigger.name: cure_sliced_tongue__

trigger.match: ^Your glands cease their oily secretion\.$
trigger.name: cure_slickness__

trigger.name: cure_slit_throat__

trigger.match: ^You no longer feel so sluggish\.$
trigger.name: cure_sluggish__

trigger.match: ^You breathe? easier as the pain in your ribs subsides\.$
trigger.name: cure_snapped_rib__

trigger.match: ^The coloured lights stop flashing before your eyes\.$
trigger.name: cure_stars__

trigger.match: ^Your (face|chest|gut|left arm|right arm) muscles loosen up\.$
trigger.name: cure_stiff__

trigger.name: cure_stiff_non__

trigger.match: ^You aren't such a complete idiot anymore\.$
trigger.name: cure_stupidity__

trigger.match: ^No longer will the sunlight harm you\.$
trigger.name: cure_sunallergy__

trigger.match: ^You feel the earth\'s taint leave your soul\.$
trigger.name: cure_taint_sick__

trigger.match: ^Your strength surges as your (left|right) thigh mends\.$
trigger.name: cure_thigh__

trigger.match: ^Your flesh is sliced to shreds as all the thorny vines are ripped away\.$
trigger.name: cure_thorns_ripped__

trigger.match: ^Time no longer warps around you\.$
trigger.name: cure_timewarp__

trigger.match: ^The warping of time lightens\,? but you are still (minorly|moderately|majorly|massively) warped\.$
trigger.name: cure_timewarp_partial__

trigger.match: ^You sense the curse of treebane leaves? your spirit\.$
trigger.name: cure_treebane__

trigger.match: ^You stop trembling\.$
trigger.name: cure_trembling__

trigger.match: ^Your (left|right) (arm|leg) strengthens\.$
trigger.name: cure_twisted_limb__

trigger.match: ^You shake your head and clear it of vapors\.$
trigger.name: cure_vapors__

trigger.match: ^Your fear of heights subsides\.$
trigger.name: cure_vertigo__

trigger.match: ^You no longer fear wearing clothes\.$
trigger.name: cure_vestiphobia__

trigger.match: ^Your thoughts coalesce into coherence\.$
trigger.name: cure_void__

trigger.match: ^Your stomach becalms itself\.$
trigger.name: cure_vomiting__

trigger.match: ^The stomach cramps lift and your gorge settles\.$
trigger.name: cure_vomiting_blood__

trigger.match: ^Your limbs strengthen and you feel stronger\.$
trigger.name: cure_weakness__

trigger.match: ^Your stomach rumbles and you cough up dead worms\.$
trigger.name: cure_worms__

trigger.match: ^As you chant the ritual of Puer over your (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg)\, you feel your skin tighten\, tendons knit together and bones strengthen\.$
trigger.name: highmagic_puer__

trigger.match: ^Your (chest|gut|head|left arm|left leg|right arm|right leg) is (?:already )?fully healed\.$
trigger.name: highmagic_puer_healed__
